content:
Any experience or advice on what to do when a profile / IG is deprecated?
(deprecated = replaced by another or simply outdated)
You can change the status. You can also have the new one use the 'replaces' link that points back to the old one.
"replaces"? that would be an HTML link, not an element in the IG resource, right?
in terms of managing the lifecycle, any other things we can expect? like when / how to deprecate, communication and compatibility...
